name: Spicy Ranch Bean Salad 🥗
description: Get creative with canned beans in this 5-minute salad that’s ideal for lunch in a pinch. The ranch vinaigrette adds a tangy kick that pairs perfectly with the crunchy cucumber, spicy jalapeño, and creamy beans.
instructions: In a medium bowl, mix together the ranch powder, vinegar, and olive oil until combined.
Add the beans, cucumber, jalapeño, avocado, and herbs. Season with salt and black pepper, then toss to coat with the dressing.
